entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
